Package emr_vis_nlp.view.doc_grid

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BifocalDistortionDocGrid
    modified version of BifocalDistortion for use with document grid.
    DocGridTableSelectorModel  
    DocumentGrid
    2d grid-based layout for documents; user selects attributes for X and Y axes, documents arranged according to values for these attributes.
    DocumentGrid.DocumentColorAction
    Set fill and border colors based on various criteria, and font colors.
    DocumentGrid.DocumentShapeAction  
    DocumentGrid.DocumentSizeAction  
    DocumentGrid.SquareShapeAction  
    DocumentGridAxisLayout
    Performs layout of axis labels for a DocumentGridLayout.
    DocumentGridAxisRenderer
    Renderer for the variable-sized axes used by the DocumentGrid view.
    DocumentGridLayout
    Performs layout-oriented functions for the DocumentGrid view.
    DocumentGridTable
    Backing Prefuse table for the DocumentGrid view.
    FisheyeDistortionDocGrid
    Heavily based on prefuse.action.distortion.FisheyeDistortion .
